T02D3024:70b-0: @70b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3024:70b-1: 'jig rten gyi lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa la
T02D3024:70b-2: lha chen po brgyad kyi cho gas lha mnyes par
T02D3024:70b-3: 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas
T02D3024:70b-4: ; dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la gtor ma la sogs pa snga ma ltar bshams la /
T02D3024:70b-5: lha chen po brgyad kyi gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02D3024:70b-6: de re re la ngar glud sor bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bskor la /
T02D3024:70b-7: tshon gyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgyur la dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' mar gzhag go /
T02D3024:71a-0: @71a * // de nas lha chen po rnams spyan drang ba ni /
T02D3024:71a-1: h'um ri rab chen po'i yang steng nas //
T02D3024:71a-2: 'jig rten stobs ldan lha chen rnams //
T02D3024:71a-3: dral shul ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul ldan //
T02D3024:71a-4: dbang phyug grags pa rnams skyed pa //
T02D3024:71a-5: legs pa'i lam yang ston pa ste //
T02D3024:71a-6: lha chen drag po 'khor dang bcas ;
T02D3024:71a-7: /'dir sbyon legs pa'i lam ston cig / sa ma
T02D3024:71a-8: ya dza: / de nas bstod cing gtor ma dbul
T02D3024:71a-9: ba ni / h'um shar phyogs lha chen dbang phyug ni //
T02D3024:71a-10: zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa //
T02D3024:71a-11: sku mdog sngo skya 'jigs byed pa //
T02D3024:71a-12: skra brdzes spyan yang 'bru tshugs lta //
T02D3024:71a-13: dur khrod 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D3024:71a-14: g-yas na tri sh'ul rtse gsum bsnams //
T02D3024:71a-15: g-yon na thod pa khrag 'dren pa //
T02D3024:71a-16: de la bstod de gtor ma dbul //
T02D3024:71a-17: lho phyogs lha chen rgyal chen ni //
T02D3024:71a-18: sku mdog ser la zhal gcig pa //
T02D3024:71a-19: 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag gnyis pa //
T02D3024:71a-20: g-yas pa rdo rje gsum pa bsnams //
T02D3024:71a-21: g-yon pa rus pa'i phreng ba 'dzin //
T02D3024:71a-22: de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul //
T02D3024:71a-23: nub phyogs lha dbang tshangs pa ni //
T02D3024:71a-24: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar //
T02D3024:71a-25: skra brdzes mche ba gtsigs pa la //
T02D3024:71a-27: g-yas pa dung chen g-yas 'khyil bsnams //
T02D3024:71a-29: de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul //
T02D3024:71a-30: byang phygos lha chen khyab 'jug ni //
T02D3024:71a-31: zhal dgu phyag gnyis sku mdog dud //
T02D3024:71a-32: mgo lus spyan gyis khengs pa ste //
T02D3024:71a-33: ro smad sprul nag 'khyil pa la /
T02D3024:71a-34: g-yas pa'i phyag na dbyug to 'phyar //
T02D3024:71a-35: g-yon pa'i phyag na 'khor lo bsnams //
T02D3024:71a-36: de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul //
T02D3024:71a-37: shar lho 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ni //
T02D3024:71a-38: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog smug / dur khrod 'jigs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D3024:71a-39: ha ha hi hi cher sgrogs pa //
T02D3024:71a-40: g-yas pa mda' ste g-yon pa gzhu //
T02D3024:71a-41: de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul ;
T02D3024:71a-42: / lho nub tshogs kyi bdag po ni //
T02D3024:71a-43: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag / sprul gyis lus brgyan 'jigs rung ba //
T02D3024:71a-44: rab 'jigs dbang chen kun gyi gtso //
T02D3024:71a-45: glang sngon sna la mche ba gtsigs //
T02D3024:71a-46: g-yas pa glang chen mche ba bsnams //
T02D3024:71a-47: g-yon ba glang ko rlon pa 'dzin //
T02D3024:71b-0: @71b de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul //
T02D3024:71b-1: nub byang nag po chen po ni //
T02D3024:71b-2: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gang / skra g-yengs so gnan khrag gis brlan //
T02D3024:71b-3: g-yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin //
T02D3024:71b-4: g-yon pa'i phyag na zhags ba bsnams //
T02D3024:71b-5: de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul //
T02D3024:71b-6: byang shar smin drug dbang phyug bu //
T02D3024:71b-7: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang //
T02D3024:71b-8: 'jigs byed chen po'i zhal gdangs nas //
T02D3024:71b-9: rab tu rngam pa'i nga ro can //
T02D3024:71b-10: phyag gnyis mdung thung gsor byed cing //
T02D3024:71b-11: de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul //
T02D3024:71b-12: lha chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas //
T02D3024:71b-13: mchod dang gtor ma phul ba yis //
T02D3024:71b-14: 'jig rten lha rnams mnyes byas te /
T02D3024:71b-15: bdag gi 'dod pa'i don rnams ni //
T02D3024:71b-16: nges par 'grub par mdzad du gsol //
T02D3024:71b-17: zhes gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la //
T02D3024:71b-18: ri'i rtse mo la sil snyan sna tshogs pa'i sgra dang ldan par byas la bskyal la /
T02D3024:71b-19: dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing bkra shis gsol //
T02D3024:71b-20: 'jig rten gyi lha mnyes par byed pa /
